name: For The Earth
description:
This is the list modification :

  1. Change on main menu (UI and background )
  2. Add cutscenes(story) before entering every level of the game
  3. There is 3 level to play each level increase the difficulty
  4.  Create powerup (health buff) for player to take to increase health point
  5. Changing music and sound fx of the game (main menu music, game over music, win music, ending music,etc)
  6.  Ending scene for the game after player finish their game
  7. Create simple obstacle for player to break to move to next area of map
  8. 3 different layout map for each level
  9. Change some enemy damage and follow range to make the game more interesting
  10.  Add credit scene for fun :)
  11. Change GUI to show how many health player have left

Created by : Jonathan Marcello
